00020 #include "ExtendedFasta.h"

00022 namespace Circal

00031 
00032     void ExtendedFasta::appendFromStream(istream & input,
00033         bpp::VectorSequenceContainer & vsc) const throw(bpp::Exception)
00034       {
00035         if (!input)
00036           {
00037             throw bpp::IOException ("Fasta::read: fail to open file");
00038           }
00039 
00040         string temp, name, base = ""; // Initialization
00041         vector<int> sequence;
00042 
00043         // Main loop : for all file lines
00044         while (!input.eof())
00045           {
00046             getline(input, temp, '\n'); // Copy current line in temporary string
00047 
00048 
00049             // If first character is >
00050             if (temp[0] == '>')
00051               {
00052                 // If a name and a sequence were found
00053                 if ((name != "") && (!sequence.empty()))
00054                   {
00055                     // New sequence creation, and addition in existing VectorSequenceContainer
00056                     bpp::Sequence* seq = new bpp::Sequence(name, sequence, vsc.getAlphabet());
00057                     vsc.addSequence(*seq);
00058                   }
00059                 // Sequence name isolation
00060                 name = temp;
00061                 name.erase(name.begin()); // Character > deletion
00062               }
00063             else if (!temp.empty())// Sequence isolation
00064               {
00065                 sequence.clear();
00066                 stringstream seqstream(temp);
00067 
00068                 while (seqstream)
00069                   {
00070                     seqstream >> base;
00071                     base.resize(
00072                         bpp::AlphabetTools::getAlphabetCodingSize(vsc.getAlphabet()),
00073                         ' ');
00074                     sequence.push_back(vsc.getAlphabet()->charToInt(base));
00075                   }
00076                 //Seems like the last added is double.. remove it
00077                 sequence.pop_back();
00078               }
00079           }
00080 
00081         // Addition of the last sequence in file
00082         if ((name != "") && (!sequence.empty()))
00083           {
00084             bpp::Sequence * seq = new bpp::Sequence(name, sequence, vsc.getAlphabet());
00085             vsc.addSequence(*seq);
00086           }
00087       }
00088   }
